channel.title: SFoL 36 Expansionist - Marl, Maximus and Livicus win!
channel.description:
## Welcome
Host: NuclearBurrito Co-Host: Insanity Co-Co-Host: Marcus_Doodalee
### Rules
https://forum.imperium42.com/t/forum-of-lies-official-hub/1515
### Gameplay Days will be 4 IRL days long, or shorter if someone dies Nights will be 1 IRL days long Actions are done by messaging me Revolution members will talk through DMs. They can talk there during both the day and night When you receive a card you will have 24 hours to reply, confirming you have received it
### Executions To accuse someone say "**/accuse [player]**" or "**/vote [player]**" When someone is on Trial they will be able to make a single post defense, during this time no-one should post, everyone will then vote Guilty or innocent in the thread until hammer is reached or until EoD Executions end the Day
### Projects
There are now projects that are funded during the day with resources. New projects are voted on and provide passive effects once completed. Funding is private and it is only revealed when a project is completed. You may start up to 2 Projects per day but each person may only contribute to 1 of them. The Chancellor (King) proposes the 2 Projects and people just vote yes or no for each of them.
Voting for Projects is the first thing that happens each day starting Day 2
Resources are committed to a project during the day privately in your class card. It is never revealed who or how meany resources are contributed towards a project. If at the end of the day a project has enough resources to be completed then it will come into play at the start of the next day and it's effects will last for the rest of the game.
Your resource does not change when your class does.
The Resources you can have are: Wood, Stone and Gold depending on your starting class
[details="Projects"] * Lumber mill - Everyone who has Wood may provide another Wood to a project (8 Wood, 5 Stone, 2 Gold) * Shipyard - If the Lumber Mill is built, then can be built. Anyone who visits this room will be able to move themself to a player of their choice the next night, and be affected by all actions that affect their target the night after. Doesn't affect investigative abilities (12 Wood, 3 Stone, 1 Gold) * Quarry - Everyone who has Stone may provide another Stone to a project (8 Stone, 5 Wood, 2 Gold) * Treasury - Everyone who has Gold may provide another Gold to a project (6 Stone, 6 Wood, 5 Gold) * Alchemy Campus - If a player who has Wood or Stone visits this room, they may use either resource the following day. (8 Wood, 6 Stone, 3 Gold) * Grainery - 1 Less Civilian dies per night. Can be built more than once. If there is more than 2 then new Citizens are born each night. (6 Wood, 5 Stone, 4 Gold) * Common Room - Can be visited. Anyone who visits this room will do their action on everyone else who visits this room. You will not know who. (4 Wood, 6 Stone, 2 Gold) * Public Security - Citizens are death immune. Doesn’t stop starvation deaths (12 Wood, 20 Stone, 8 Gold) * Armory - Can be visited. Anyone who visits this room will have their abilities bypass death and occupy immunity’s the next night. (6 Wood, 4 Stone, 1 Gold) * Sleeping Quarters - Players become occupy immune after being occupied twice. (4 Wood, 4 Stone, 2 Gold) [/details]
### Civilians There are NPC civilians. The game starts with 10. If there are ever 0 then the NK wins. They have other effects on the game as well. 2 die every night of starvation starting night 2 and they can be collectively targeted by some abilities.
### Chancellor ># Chancellor > **Unknown Special** > Resource: Any + Starting Resource > >Passive 1: Diplomatic immunity - You cannot be investigated or converted and your resources cannot be tampered with by any abilities. If you are a member of the Revolution you do not count towards their faction cap. You also cannot be jailed or attacked by a Dominion member. Passive 2: Political Leader - You may put forward up to 2 different projects per day. Everyone including you will vote yes or no on each of them throughout the day until an option is hammered. > > Day Ability: Public Support - Each living Civilian will add a vote to your next vote. This can affect any vote. (3 uses) > >Night Ability: Guards! - Give target player death immunity tonight. Can target self or the civilians. (3 uses) > >Goal is the same as your original class
The Chancellor does not spawn. Instead a player is anonymously elected as Chancellor at the start of Day 2. The vote is over 24 hours and is anonymous. If the Chancellor is killed there will be another one elected the next day unless there are 4 or less players.
The Chancellor keeps their old ability's and passives but they can still only do 1 day action and 1 night action.
### After The Night You will be told what happened to you >**Night:** You slept peacefully You were unfortunately killed You were converted to the Rebellion! **Day:** You were exposed to deadly poison!
### Journals Message me your entire journal, the last draft I receive before you die shall be the one displayed
### To Join To join, simply express interest in joining by saying something like "I want to join" or "/join" or "/in" or "sign me up, coach" or whatever you want
# Classes Dominion = Uninformed Majority Revolution = Informed Minority
[details="Dominion classes"] > # [color = "green"] The Lord [/color] :shield: :crossed_swords: > **[color = "green"]Dominion Special[/color]** > **[color = "gold"]Gold[/color]** > >Passive: Royalty - Every 2 citizens count as an extra vote on you for chancellor > >Day Ability: Jail - Choose a player to jail at night occupying the target (Bypasses occupy immunity) and preventing visits to them. You both will be able to send each other a single 1000 character message through the host. (6 Uses) > >Night Ability 1: Execute - Kill the Jailed player. Bypasses everything. Disabled if you kill a Dominion member. (3 Uses) > > Night Ability 2: Compensate - Target players Resource counts for one more (Unlimited)
> # [color = "green"] Inspector [/color] :crossed_swords: > **[color = "green"] Dominion Investigative [/color]** > **[color = "lightgray"]Stone[/color]** > >Day Ability: Overtime - Your Night abilities will be stronger tonight. (2 uses) > >Night Ability 1: Inspection - Learn if target player is a member of the Revolution. If you use Overtime you will get their exact faction. (Unlimited) >Night Ability 2: Widened Search - Chose a non-Dominion class and any number of players. You will learn if any of the players are the selected class but not which one. If you used overtime you may choose a Dominion class. Does not count as a visit (3 uses)
> Converts to the **[color = "steblue"] Sleuth [/color]**
> # [color = "green"] Watchman [/color] > **[color = "green"] Dominion Investigative [/color]** > **[color = "brown"] Wood [/color]** > >Night Ability 1: Keep watch - Learn who visits target player or room and who target player visits if you targeted a player. Can target the civilians (Unlimited) >Night Ability 2: Background Check - Learn target player’s class type (2 uses)
> Converts to the **[color = "steblue"] Overseer [/color]**
> # [color = "green"] Earl [/color] > **[color = "green"] Dominion Investigative [/color]** > **[color = "gold"] Gold [/color]** > >Passive: Royalty - Every 2 citizens count as an extra vote on you for chancellor > >Day Ability: Progress report - Learn how many resources have been contributed to target project at the start of the night (3 uses) > >Night Ability 1: Take Stock - Learn which resource target player has (Unlimited) >Night Ability 2: Project Record - Learn who contributed to target completed project (1 use)
> Converts to the **[color = "steblue"] Viscount [/color]**
> # [color = "green"] Clinician [/color] > **[color = "green"]Dominion Support[/color]** > **[color = "lightgray"] Stone [/color]** > Passive 1: Sterilization - Immune to poison > > Night Ability 1: Care take - Heal target player or the civilians(Unlimited) > Night Ability 2: Quarantine - Prevent visits to target player (2 uses)
> Converts to the **[color = "steblue"] Quack [/color]**
> # [color = "green"]Duke[/color] > **[color = "green"]Dominion Support[/color]** > **[color = "gold"]Gold[/color]** > >Passive: Royalty - Every 2 citizens count as an extra vote on you for chancellor > >Day Ability: Invest - Target player is immune to conversion until you select another player. Can only prevent conversion twice (Unlimited) > >Night Ability: Fund - Ensure target player’s night action is successful and accurate (Unlimited)
> Converts to the **[color = "steblue"] Barron [/color]**
> # [color = "green"] Vanguard [/color] > **[color = "green"] Dominion Killer [/color]** > **[color = "lightgray"] Stone [/color]** > >Night Ability 1: Swordplay - Kill target player. If you kill a Dominion member you will kill yourself as well. (Unlimited) >Night Ability 2: Redirect any visitors attacking target player to you bypassing immunity. You will attack anyone redirected this way and they cannot be healed. Can target the Civilians. (Unlimited)
> Converts to the **[color = "steblue"] Sellsword [/color]**
> # [color = "green"]Champion[/color] > **[color = "green"] Dominion Killer [/color]** > **[color = "brown"] Wood [/color]** > Passive 1: Occupy and Redirect immune > Passive 2: Last Stand - If you are the last Dominion member alive then you can use both night abilities in the same night > >Night Ability 1: Parry - If target player tries to use an ability on you tonight then remove their immunity’s and redirect them to themselves. (Unlimited) >Night Ability 2: Strike - Kill and occupy target player. If you kill a Dominion member then this gets disabled until Last Stand triggers (2 uses)
> Converts to the **[color = "steblue"] Gladiator [/color]**
> # [color = "green"]Captain[/color] > **[color = "green"]Dominion Offensive[/color]** > **[color = "lightgray"]Stone[/color]** > >Passive: Occupy and Redirect immune > >Night Ability 1: Command - Redirect your first target to your second. You only visit your first target. Cannot make someone self target. (Unlimited) > > Night Ability 2: Discipline - Disable target player's passives tonight. (2 uses)
> Converts to the **[color = "steblue"] Director [/color]**
> # [color = "green"]Engineer[/color] > **[color = "green"]Dominion Offensive[/color]** > **[color = "brown"]Wood[/color]** > >Passive: Occupy and redirect immune > >Night Ability 1: Seal - Occupy target player (Unlimited) >Night Ability 2: Redistribute - Target player will instead contribute to the same project you did (Unknowingly) (3 uses)
> Converts to the **[color = "steblue"] Tinkerer [/color]**
> # [color = "green"]Mediator[/color] :shield: > **[color = "green"]Dominion Social[/color]** > **[color = "brown"]Wood[/color]** > >Passive: Calm and Collected - You can use both night abilities in the same night > >Night Ability 1: Negotiate - Link 2 players together. They may each send each other 2 1000 character messages. You will get each message too. (Unlimited) >Night Ability 2: Notice - Send an anonymous message to target player immediately (3 uses)
> Converts to the **[color = "steblue"] Ambassador [/color]**
> # [color = "green"]Scribe[/color] > **[color = "green"]Dominion Social[/color]** > **[color = "brown"]Wood[/color]** > >Night Ability 1: Record - Get the feedback of anyone visiting target player or room. May target the civilians. Doesn't see conversions (Unlimited) >Night Ability 2: Document - Get target player's feedback (2 uses)
> Converts to the **[color = "steblue"] Messenger [/color]** [/details]
[details="Revolution"] If the Revolutionary dies then the Missionary becomes the Revolutionary If the Missionary dies then the oldest non-Revolutionary Revolution member becomes the Missionary
> # [color = "steblue"] Revolutionary [/color] :shield: :crossed_swords: > **[color = "steblue"]Revolution Special[/color]** > **[color = "gold"]Gold[/color]** >Passive: Leadership - Immune to occupy and redirect > >Night Ability 1: Inspire - Convert target player to the Revolution. 4 Max revolution members(Unlimited. 1 day cooldown) >Night Ability 2: Scout - Learn what immunity's target player has (including conversion) (4 uses)
> # [color = "steblue"]Missionary[/color] :shield::crossed_swords: > **[color = "steblue"]Revolution Killer[/color]** > **[color = "lightgray"]Stone[/color]** > >Day Ability 1: Overdose - Poison target player (4 uses) > >Night Ability 1: Crusade - Kill target player. You may attack the civilians (Unlimited) >Night Ability 2: Old tricks - Use the primary ability of your original Revolutionary class. Not available for starting Missionary (3 uses)
> # [color = "steblue"]Sleuth[/color] > **[color = "steblue"]Revolution Investigative[/color]** > > Night Ability: Expedited Search - Choose any number of classes and any number of players. You will learn if any of the players are any of the classes. Does not count as visiting(Unlimited)
> # [color = "steblue"]Overseer[/color] > **[color = "steblue"]Revolution Investigative[/color]** > >Day Ability: Track - You will know who target player visits tonight. (Unlimited) > >Night Ability 1: Overwatch - Learn who visits target player or room. You can target the civilians. (Unlimited) >Night Ability 2: Stalk - Learn target player's class (2 uses)
> # [color = "steblue"]Viscount[/color] > **[color = "steblue"]Revolution Investigative[/color]** > >Passive: Royalty > >Day Ability: Record Check - Learn what resources have been contributed to all active projects. (3 uses) > >Night Ability 1: Track Goods - Learn which resource target player has and which project they are contributing to. (Unlimited) >Night Ability 2: Project Record - Learn who contributed to target completed project (1 use)
> # [color = "steblue"]Quack[/color] > **[color = "steblue"]Revolution Support[/color]** > >Night Ability 1: Isolate - Prevent non-revolution members from visiting target player (2 uses) >Night Ability 2: Emergency Repairs - Heal the entire Revolution. (3 uses)
> # [color = "steblue"]Barron[/color] > **[color = "steblue"]Revolution Support[/color]** > >Passive: Royalty > >Night Ability 1: Bribe - Can't be prevented. Revolution members cannot be prevented, occupied or redirected when trying to visit target player. (Unlimited) >Night Ability 2: Equip - Target player's abilities bypass immunity's tonight. (3 uses)
> # [color = "steblue"]Sellsword[/color] > **[color = "steblue"]Revolution Killer[/color]** > >Night Ability 1: Blood for Blood - if a Revolution member dies tonight then attack their killer (2 uses) >Night Ability 2: Cold Blood - If the Revolutionary fails to convert or the missionary fails to kill then attack target player (unlimited)
> # [color = "steblue"]Gladiator[/color] > **[color = "steblue"]Revolution Offensive[/color]** > >Passive: Occupy and redirect immune > >Night Ability 1: Swipe - If target player visits the Revolution then remove their immunities and redirect them to themselves (Unlimited) >Night Ability 2: Pummel - Occupy target player for 2 nights (2 uses)
> # [color = "steblue"]Director[/color] > **[color = "steblue"]Revolution Offensive[/color]** > >Passive: Occupy and redirect immune > >Night Ability 1: Direct - Redirect your first target to your second. You only visit your first target. Cannot make someone self target. (Unlimited) >Night Ability 2: Discipline - Disable target player’s passives tonight. (2 uses)
> # [color = "steblue"]Tinkerer[/color] > **[color = "steblue"]Revolution Offensive[/color]** > >Passive: Occupy and redirect immune > >Night Ability 1: Seal - Occupy target player (Unlimited) >Night Ability 2: Redistribute - Target player will instead contribute to the same project you did (Unknowingly). Their contribution will be worth one more (3 uses)
> # [color = "steblue"]Ambassador[/color] :shield: > **[color = "steblue"]Revolutionary Social[/color]** > > Passive: Calm and Collected - You can use both night abilities > >Night Ability 1: Negotiate - Link 2 players together. They may each send each other 2 1000 character messages. You will get each message too. (Unlimited) >Night Ability 2: Notice - Send an anonymous message to target player immediately (3 uses)
> # [color = "steblue"]Messenger[/color] > **[color = "steblue"]Revolution Social[/color]** > >Night Ability 1: Tamper - Target player will appear to be a member of the Revolution. You will receive the feedback of people visiting your target. (Unlimited) >Night Ability 2: Intercept - Target player will receive information feedback. You will see the correct feedback. (Unlimited) [/details]
[details="Neutrals"] > # Spy > **Neutral Killer** > **Any** > >Passive 1: Field Medic - Occupy and redirect immune. If you would die you will heal yourself >Passive 2: Thief - Any excess resources put to a project will go to you. You keep them until they are put towards a project. You investigate as having whichever resource you used towards a project with the **Any** You may instead DM a resource without any associated project to change your Investigative result without contributing to a project. > >Day Ability 1: Bug - Learn who target player visited last night and who visited them as well as their night result (Unlimited) >Day Ability 2: Demolition - Destroy target building at the end of the night. You cannot use abilities tonight. (1 use) > >Night Ability 1: Sabotage - Kill target player. Does not count as a visit. Can target civilians. (Unlimited) >Night Ability 2: All in - Kill target player. Bypasses night immunity, healing and visit prevention. Will Kill 2 civilians instead of 1 if you target them. (3 uses) > > *Goal: Eliminate the Dominion and the Revolution or Eliminate the Civilians*
> # Builder > **Neutral Support** > **[color = "lightgray"] Stone [/color]** > Passive: Reinforced Lock - Death immune once > > Night Ability 1: Hasten - Target player's resource contribution counts double tonight. Cannot target Chancellor (Unlimited) > Night Ability 2: Resume - Learn if target player contributed more than one resource tonight. (4 uses) > > *Goal: See 5 projects completed. You do not have to survive*
> # Beggar > **Neutral Offensive** > **None** > >Passive: Stockpile - You keep any resources you have taken until used or contributed to a project. You start with 1 Wood. > >Day Ability 1: Shelter - Consume Wood to give yourself death immunity (X Uses) >Day Ability 2: Wall - Consume Stone to occupy target player tonight. (X Uses) > >Night Ability 1: Beg - Steal target player's resource. It will not be contributed tonight. You can use it for yourself (Unlimited) >Night Ability 2: Hired Sword - Consume Gold to kill target player. (X Uses) > > *Goal: Survive*
> # Merchant > **Neutral Offensive** > **[color = "lightgray"]Stone[/color]** > >Passive: Hired Guards - Death immune once. Immune to occupy > >Day Ability: Barter - Swap your resource for target players at the start of the night. They will (Unknowingly) contribute your current resource instead of their normal one tonight. You will get their resource until you use this ability again. (Unlimited) > >Night Ability: Purchase - Do an action depending on the resource you have. Wood: Occupy target player, Stone: Prevent visits to target player, Gold: Redirect your first target to your second cannot select the same target twice, Any: Occupy target player bypassing night immunity and Prevent visits to your target. (Unlimited) > > *Goal: Be alive on Day 6*
> # Bounty Hunter > **Neutral Social** > **[color = "brown"]Wood[/color]** > >Passive: Trained - Immune to death, occupy and redirect > >Day Ability: Take contract - Set a bounty on target player at the start of the night (5 uses) > >Night Ability 1: Frame - Target player will appear as a revolution member tonight (Unlimited) >Night Ability 2: Mistrial - Target player will flip as a class of your choice if executed tomorrow (1 use) > > *Goal: Get 3 Bounties executed during the day*
> # Insider :shield: > **Neutral Investigative** > **[color = "brown"]Wood[/color]** > >Passive: Allegiance - Immune to death from non-Dominion classes > >Day Ability: Snitch - Send an anonymous 1000 character message to target player (Unlimited) > >Night Ability 1: Snoop - Learn target players class (Unlimited) >Night Ability 2: Interrogate - Learn who target player has visited and when (Including tonight) throughout the entire game (3 uses) > > *Live to see the Dominion lose* [/details]
### Rolelist: **[color=steblue]Revolutionary[/color]** **[color=steblue]Missionary[/color]** **[color=green]The Lord[/color]** **[color=green]The Inspector[/color]** **[color=Green]Random Dominion[/color]** **[color=Green]Random Dominion[/color]** **[color=Green]Random Dominion[/color]** **[color=Green]Random Dominion[/color]** **[color=Green]Random Dominion[/color]** **[color=Green]Random Dominion[/color]** **[color=Green]Random Dominion[/color]** **[color=Green]Random Dominion[/color]** **[color=Green]Random Dominion[/color]** **[color=grey]Neutral Killer[/color]** **[color=grey]Neutral Non-Killer[/color]** **[color=grey]Neutral Non-Killer[/color]**
Signups 1. FireKitten - Dead N0 - **[color = "green"] The Lord [/color]** 2. PoisonedSquid - Alive 3. Frostwolf - Alive 4. Marluxion - Alive 5. GamerPoke - Dead D2 - **[color = "green"] The Clinician [/color]** 6. MaximusPrime - Alive 7. Icibalus - Dead D1 - **[color = "green"] The Vanguard [/color]** 8. Alice - Dead N1 - **[color = "steblue"] The Sleuth [/color]** 9. Livicus - Alive 10. Margaret - Alive 11. BlueSt0rm22- Alive 12. bazingaboy- Alive 13. Sam17z - Alive 14. Shurian - Alive 15. Pug - Alive 16. hjasik - Alive
[Day 1](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/sfol-36-expansionist-day-1-the-lord-has-fallen/72559/187) [Day 2](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/sfol-36-expansionist-day-2/72559/3488?u=nuclearburrito)

item.title: SFoL 36 Expansionist - Marl, Maximus and Livicus win!
item.dc:creator: BlueStorm
item.description:
That’s because the NK is meant to be hard to play as because you’re one person.

Giving bad players a cheap way to win isn’t helpful for the bad player because they don’t learn anything from it.

Read full topic
